DOC.brief_summary: Besides contrast-induced acute kidney injury ( CI-AKI ) , adscititious vital organ damage hypoxic liver injury ( HLI ) may affect survival patient ST-elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) . Therefore , investigator seek evaluate prognostic impact CI-AKI HLI STEMI patient underwent primary percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Impact Organ Damage STEMI Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A total 668 consecutive patient ( 77.2 % male , mean age 61.3±13.3 year ) STEMI underwent primary PCI analyze . Hypertension define systolic blood pressure ≥140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure ≥90 mmHg , antihypertensive prescription . Type 2 diabetes define hypoglycemic agent insulin prescription , fast plasma glucose ≥126 mg/dL , glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) ≥6.5 % , know untreated hyperglycemia . Dyslipidemia define total cholesterol ≥240 mg/dL , LDL cholesterol ≥130 mg/dL , HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dL , triglyceride ≥200 mg/dL , and/or lipid-lowering prescription.STEMI define typical chest pain last > 30 min within last 24h , electrocardiographic finding ST elevation > 1 mm least two consecutive lead new-onset leave bundle branch block , 2-fold elevation serum level troponin-I creatine kinase-MB upper normal limit . Obstructive CAD define ≥50 % luminal narrowing extent obstructive CAD categorize accord number vessel involve ( 1 , 2 , 3 ) . CI-AKI defined increase serum creatinine ≥0.5 mg/dl 25 % relative rise , within 48h index procedure . HLI define ≥2-fold increase serum aspartate transaminase upper normal limit admission . Patients divide four group accord CI-AKI HLI state . Major adverse cardiovascular cerebrovascular event ( MACCE ) define composite all-cause mortality , non-fatal MI , non-fatal stroke , ischemia-driven target lesion revascularization target vessel revascularization record . Continuous data express mean value ± standard deviation median value ( interquartile range ) appropriate . Categorical data present percentage absolute number . Analyses continuous data perform use analysis variance ( ANOVA ) test Kruskal-Wallis test appropriate analysis categorical data perform use chi-square test ass difference among four group . Cumulative event rate function time estimate use Kaplan-Meier method .
DOC.criteria: STEMI patient undergone primary PCI Chronic liver disease Life expectancy < 1year
